document.full_text: though he is struggling to break into the television market on his home turf, mexico's carlos slim has emerged as the top provider of pay tv in latin america, firming his grip on the region's telecom market.
document.title: analysis: tycoon slim emerges as latam's top pay tv player
lines_and_colors: though he is struggling to break into the television market on his home turf, mexico's carlos slim has emerged as the top provider of pay tv in latin america, firming his grip on the region's telecom market.
